name: CareConnect-ReasonCondition-1-Extension
description: The reason why a resource was added/performed/given. This may be due to a Condition, may be coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.

element.definition: The reason why a resource was added/performed/given. This may be due to a Condition, may be coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.

binding.description: Coded identification of the condition or diagnosis.
